title: Dr. Horrible and Other Horrible Stories
description:
Dr. Horrible and Other Horrible Stories 

Dark Horse, 2011, 84 pages

Writer: Zack Whedon 
Artists: Eric Canete, Farel Dalrymple, Jim Rugg, JoÃƒÂ«lle Jones 

Based on the Emmy Award-winning web series Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog, this collection of stories written by Zack Whedon (Deadwood, Fringe) chronicles some of the earliest adventures in the lives of archenemies Captain Hammer and Dr. Horrible.

This anthology solves many unanswered questions from the show. For instance: What event inspired Dr. Horrible to become the world's greatest criminal mastermind? Why is Penny, the beautiful girl from the Laundromat, still single? How can you, the reader, be like blustering do-gooder Captain Hammer? And why is Horrible's sidekick, Moist, soÃ¢â‚¬Â¦umÃ¢â‚¬Â¦well, you'll find out!
